summary: A happily married 24-year-old woman who experiences an inexplicable, rather restless craving to finally live her life intensely, retells her extra-marital escapades to her husband intending to spice up their marriage.
cast: Claudia Koll|Paolo Lanza|Franco Branciaroli|Isabella Deiana|Renzo Rinaldi|Ornella Marcucci|Marco Marciani|Maurizio Martinoli|Luciana Cirenei|Rossana Di Pierro|Rosa Maria Pezzullo|Osiride Pevarello|Antonio Conte|Lucia Lucchesino|Pierangela Vallerino|Jean René Lemoine|Andrea Berardicurti|Tinto Brass
title: Così fan tutte
